submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        m = n // 2
        tmp = []
        cnt = Counter()
        for i in range(m):
            cnt[abs(nums[i] - nums[-i - 1])] += 1
            tmp.append(min(nums[i], k - nums[i], nums[-i - 1], k - nums[-i - 1]))
        
        tmp.sort()
        ans = inf
        for a, v in cnt.items():
            a = k - a
            one = bisect_left(tmp, a + 1)
            dou = m - one
            ans = min(ans, one - v + dou * 2)
        return ans
